results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(13).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 13000); x=contfrac(sqrt(13)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010122.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009
xref: Cf. A010470 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
